headline: Is A Recession Coming in 2025? Where to Invest Now
summary: Tracey Ryniec and Zacks Chief Equity Strategist, John Blank, discuss the state of the economy and what stocks to invest in after the stock sell-off.

headline: Pioneer Founder Considers Asking FTC to Rescind Exxon Board Ban
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Scott Sheffield, the shale pioneer who sold his company to Exxon Mobil Corp. and was banned from its board by the US Federal Trade Commission, said he’s considering asking the regulator to rescind a ban on him being part of the oil major’s board.Most Read from BloombergTrump DEI Purge Hits Affordable Housing GroupsElectric Construction Equipment Promises a Quiet RevolutionNYC Congestion Pricing Toll Gains Support Among City ResidentsOpen Philanthropy Launches $120 Million Fund To

headline: ExxonMobil Taps Canada's Cedar LNG to Boost Asian Exports
summary: XOM secures its first long-term Canadian LNG deal to purchase 1.5 mtpa from ARC Resources' Cedar LNG project, expected to start operations in late 2028.

headline: Guyana cancels Frontera-CGX Energy JV's prospecting license
summary: Guyana's government has cancelled the Frontera and CGX Energy joint venture's prospecting license for the Corentyne block, the companies said on Thursday. In February, the South American...

headline: Where Will ExxonMobil Be in 5 Years?
summary: ExxonMobil (NYSE: XOM) has a bold view of its future.  The energy giant wants to deliver an incremental $20 billion of earnings and $30 billion of cash flow by 2030.  Here's a closer look at where ExxonMobil wants to be in five years and how it plans to get there.
